column2: "Senpai, can I ask you something? There's an enemy I'm struggling with at the Floating Facility."
"It's called Banoridian. It's got thick armor all over its body, so my attacks just get blocked."
"I think it would be pretty difficult to take one of those down with a Just Attack. How would you do it, senpai?"
"Can you show me a quick and efficient way to beat them? I'm counting on you, senpai."
